label: Design a multidimensional business intelligence (BI) semantic model (25–30%)

skills.label: Create a multidimensional database by using Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS)
items: Design, develop, and create multidimensional databases
Select a storage model

skills.label: Design and implement dimensions in a cube
items: Select an appropriate dimension model, such as fact, parent-child, roleplaying, reference, data mining, many-to-many, and slowly changing dimension
Implement a dimension type
Define attribute relationships

skills.label: Implement measures and measure groups in a cube
items: Design and implement measures, measure groups, granularity, calculated measures, and aggregate functions
Define semi-additive behavior

label: Design a tabular BI semantic model (20–25%)

skills.label: Design and publish a tabular data model
items: Design measures, relationships, hierarchies, partitions, perspectives, and calculated columns
Create a time table
Publish from microsoft visual studio
Import from microsoft powerpivot
Select a deployment option, including processing option, transactional deployment, and query mode

skills.label: Configure, manage, and secure a tabular model
items: Configure tabular model storage and data refresh, configure refresh interval settings, configure user security and permissions, configure row-level security

skills.label: Develop a tabular model to access data in near real time
items: Use directquery with oracle, teradata, excel, and pivottables
Convert in-memory queries to directquery

label: Develop queries using Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) and Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) (15–20%)

skills.label: Create basic MDX queries
items: Implement basic mdx structures and functions, including tuples, sets, and topcount

skills.label: Implement custom MDX solutions
items: Create custom mdx or logical solutions for pre-prepared case tasks or business rules, define a scope statement

skills.label: Create formulas by using the DAX language
items: Use the evaluate and calculate functions, filter dax queries, create calculated measures, perform data analysis by using dax

label: Configure and maintain SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS) (30–35%)

skills.label: Plan and deploy SSAS
items: Configure memory limits, configure non-union memory architecture (numa), configure disk layout, determine ssas instance placement

skills.label: Monitor and optimize performance
items: Monitor performance and analyze query plans by using extended events and profiler, identify bottlenecks in ssas queries, monitor processing and query performance, resolve performance issues, configure usability limits, optimize and manage model design

skills.label: Configure and manage processing
items: Configure partition processing
Configure dimension processing
Use process default, process full, process clear, process data, process add, process update, process index, process structure, and process clear structure processing methods
Configure parallel, sequential, and writeback processing settings

skills.label: Create Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and translations
items: Configure kpi options, including associated measure group, value expression, goal expression, status, status expression, trend, trend expression, and weight
Create kpis in multidimensional models and tabular models
Create and develop translations
